reviews.text: I recently tried some Indian cuisine and was blown away by the flavors! The butter chicken was incredibly rich and creamy, with a perfect balance of spices that gave it depth without overwhelming the senses. The sauce was smooth, coating each tender piece of chicken in just the right way. Paired with the fragrant samali rice, which was cooked to perfection, it made for an unforgettable meal. The rice complemented the butter chicken beautifully, soaking up all the delicious sauce. Overall, each bite was packed with flavor and left me wanting more. Highly recommended for anyone looking to indulge in some authentic Indian flavors!

Good Northern Indian Food

If you are hungry for Northern Indian food, this place has both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.

On a hot weekday afternoon, this place was pretty quiet. However, the waiters were ready to serve and the chef was good to deliver.

The food was delightful. The tastes did not disappoint for sure. The plating was nice and portions generous.

Service was attentive and easy to get. They knew how to ensure customers got what they needed.

The decor of the place indoors met its objectives. They were alright for what they served. It didn‚Äôt exactly scream exuberant indulgence.

Overall a nice quiet place for good Indian food.

Good delicious Indian food, not too expensive and fast. The place is a bit crowded during lunch. But for the price it's great. Lunch sets are good but we had naan,.palak panneer and veg jalfrezi along with butter milk. Great stuff!

Enjoyed the food here! A lot of choices in menu, n kitchen happy to adjust spiciness according to preference.  Great n friendly service !
Music was a tad loud but service staff was nice n turned volume down! Would have been perfect if no music so we could have conversations with friends.
Will return! üëç

If you want to try Indian food, try this place. We had lunch on Sat in Jan 2021 with Eatigo promotion. Good taste, fresh material and authentic Indian food. Samosa with Masala Tea is a good choice. The decoration is lovely and staff are attentive. Food came a bit small size compare to other restaurant but still love it and will be back.
